lessons.title: Plants need water
lessons.content: Plants need soil, water and sunlight to grow.

quiz.question: What do plants need to grow?

lessons.title: Animals need food
lessons.content: Animals eat plants or other animals to get energy.

lessons.title: Earth has rocks and soil
lessons.content: The Earth is made of rocks, soil, and water.

quiz.question: What is the Earth made of?

lessons.title: Weather changes daily
lessons.content: Weather can be sunny, rainy, or snowy.

lessons.title: Simple machines help us
lessons.content: Simple machines like levers and pulleys make work easier.

lessons.title: Habitats for animals
lessons.content: Animals live in different habitats like forests, oceans, and deserts.

lessons.title: Recycling helps the Earth
lessons.content: Recycling means using materials again to help the Earth.
